key_risks: Workforce challenges in recruiting and retaining mental health professionals

Societal stigma around mental health care limiting patient engagement

sources.title: Lifestance: do they pay well? : r/therapists - Reddit
sources.snippet: I was with a small private practice before he sold to Lifestance. I would get 65% any week I saw over 30 patients and 60% for under 30. It also depended a lot of what insurance each patient had because the clinic had different rates negotiated with each insurance company. Like a few insurances my cut would be close to $100 a session.
